content: How can we configure our URL (eg myapp.example.com) in an EHR System like EPIC or Cerner for a user to launch our application by clicking the URL
It sounds like you're trying to use SMART on FHIR? Have you read the SMART specification and looked at the training material and presentations available online?
in general these details about application will need to be handled per vendor. For Epic, see fhir.epic.com and open.epic.com; for Cerner, see code.cerner.com
